jobDescription: TGS provides multi-client geoscience data to oil and gas Exploration and Production companies worldwide. In addition to extensive global geophysical and geological data libraries that include multi-client seismic data, magnetic and gravity data, digital well logs, production data and directional surveys, TGS also offers advanced processing and imaging services, interpretation products, permanent reservoir monitoring and data integration solutions. Job Summary:The Production Data Analyst will process & quality control all data, research customer inquiries, proactively review the data to identify areas for improvement or infill, load portions of new data into their respective models. Focus will be on supporting the Production Data and Scout Card data products and processes. data (e.g. Longbow, Production Data QA Tool, basic SQL queries, etc.).Act as a subject matter expert on production data for TGS.Provide TGS management, operations and development with direction and strategy for supporting various end-user applications and data file export formats for both products.Document and monitor requests for data and application enhancements.Proactively review data for
